Player History
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from New York (Y) to Chicago on 7/24/1985 (Going to CHC: CF Shane Mack, RF Roberto Kelly. Going to NYY: P Dennis Eckersley)...
Injured on 8/8/1985 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Released by Chicago on 4/18/1987...
Signed as a free agent by New York (G) on 4/18/1987 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 8/1/1987, off Bob Ojeda (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/6/1987, off Todd Stottlemyre (TOR)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1988...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/22/1990 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Released by Detroit on 4/3/1992...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 5/3/1992 to a minor league deal...
